channel.title: Anyway to minimize a cmd prompt to
channel.description: Is there anyway to minimize my command prompts to task manager? Because its really annoying having my scripts and things open on my taskbar.

item.title: Anyway to minimize a cmd prompt to
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“vraj82192, post:4, topic:186932”][quote author=teh spede link=topic=249463.msg2093823#msg2093823 date=1204940140]
There are programs that can do this. Google is your friend.
[/quote]

Gee thanks wise ass…

I would have never thought of that, I just didn’t know what something like that would be called.[/quote]
Well with just a little search you would have found it.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyway to minimize a cmd prompt to

@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Or you can use TrayIt!

just google TrayIt!

item.source: Anyway to minimize a cmd prompt to

item.title: Anyway to minimize a cmd prompt to
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

teh spede:

There are programs that can do this. Google is your friend.

Gee thanks wise ass…

I would have never thought of that, I just didn’t know what something like that would be called.

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:3, topic:186932”][quote author=vraj82192 link=topic=249463.msg2092686#msg2092686 date=1204875862]
Is there anyway to minimize my command prompts to task manager? Because its really annoying having my scripts and things open on my taskbar.

[/quote]

You can get RocketDock, allowing you to minimize all of your programs to a dock. See, mine has iTunes minimized. It’s very helpful, and does more than just minimizes inactive programs, it has links to programs right there on your desktop, in a sleek, space friendly form. Getting rid of the clutter of icons on your desktop. It also has things called widgets, or rather Docklets. You can get some that show todays weather, or monitor your CPU right from your Dock. It’s very handy.

RocketDock[/quote]

Ahh… ok dock.

One of the Alienware skins had that, Ill try that thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyway to minimize a cmd prompt to

item.title: Anyway to minimize a cmd prompt to
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

vraj82192:

Is there anyway to minimize my command prompts to task manager? Because its really annoying having my scripts and things open on my taskbar.

You can get RocketDock, allowing you to minimize all of your programs to a dock. See, mine has iTunes minimized. It’s very helpful, and does more than just minimizes inactive programs, it has links to programs right there on your desktop, in a sleek, space friendly form. Getting rid of the clutter of icons on your desktop. It also has things called widgets, or rather Docklets. You can get some that show todays weather, or monitor your CPU right from your Dock. It’s very handy.

RocketDock

Read full topic
